hero.title: Put Your Appointments
hero.description: Get rid of the phone traffic. Let your customers book their own appointments 24/7 with BookIt, so you can focus on your business.

payment.title: Online Payment
payment.desc: Receive payments at the time of booking.

brand.desc: The next-generation appointment management platform for your business.

newsletter.title: Stay Updated
newsletter.desc: Latest features and tips directly in your inbox.

hero.title: A Complete Toolkit for Your Business
hero.desc: Much more than just a calendar. BookIt provides everything you need to manage, grow, and automate your business.

notification1.title: Appointment Reminder ðŸ“…
notification1.message: You have an appointment with Mr. Emre tomorrow at 14:00.

notification2.title: Payment Received ðŸ’°
notification2.message: $450.00 has been deposited into your account.

notifications.title: Automatic Reminders
notifications.desc: End no-shows. Automatic SMS and Email notifications ensure your customers show up. Reduce missed appointments by 80%.

customization.title: Custom Branding
customization.desc: Customize your booking page with your logo, colors, and rules. Your customers see you, not BookIt.

Pricing.title: The Right Plan for Your Business
Pricing.subtitle: Not just a calendar, but your business's digital branch. No hidden fees.

labels.footer_text: Special SLAs and billing options available for enterprise businesses.

About.title: We design time, not just appointments.
About.subtitle: We use technology not to complicate things, but to simplify life.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To enable the digital transformation of small and medium-sized businesses with tools that require no technical knowledge.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To create an ecosystem where service providers all over the world can focus solely on their work.

story.title: Why Did We Start?
story.p1: BookIt was born watching a business owner unable to focus on their customer due to constantly ringing phones. We believed there was a third way for those stuck between traditional agendas and complex software.
story.p2: Our goal is not just to sell a booking calendar; it is to offer your business's digital showcase, reception, and assistant in a single modern interface.

Auth.title: Welcome
Auth.subtitle: Log in or sign up to access your account.

errors.email: Please enter a valid email address.
errors.minPassword: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
errors.generic: An error occurred, please try again.
errors.emailInUse: This email address is already in use.
errors.provideBot: Please verify that you are not a robot.

success.register: Registration successful! Please check your email.

CreateOrg.title: Create New Organization
CreateOrg.desc: Create a new business profile. You can edit settings later.

errors.regex: Lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only

header.title: Team Management
header.description: Manage members of your organization and their permissions.

alerts.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this user from the organization?

InviteDialog.title: Invite New Member
InviteDialog.desc: Enter the email address to add someone to the team.

InvitationErrors.emailMismatchDetail: This invitation is for {inviteEmail}, but you are logged in as {userEmail}.
InvitationErrors.success: You have successfully joined the team!

valid.title: You've Been Invited!
valid.desc: You have received an invitation to join the <bold>{orgName}</bold> team.

invalid.title: Invalid Invitation
invalid.desc: This invitation link is invalid, expired, or has already been used.

warnings.unauthenticated: To accept the invitation, you must first log in or sign up.
warnings.mismatch: Attention: You are currently logged in as <bold>{userEmail}</bold>. The invitation was sent to <bold>{inviteEmail}</bold>. Please switch to the correct account.

NotFound.title: Page Not Found
NotFound.desc: The page you are looking for might have been moved, deleted, or does not exist.
